name: Powerslam
description:
At long last... wrestling slams its way onto the Mac with the first ever pro wrestling game for OS X! This action packed anime wrestling game comes full of different match types. From the standard one on one match to the deadly Deathmatch where the ring gets loaded full of weapons. The action is so extreme you may even find yourself brawling backstage or in the parking lot! Mac owners have waited far too long for a wrestling game but now with Powerslam finally here you'll have hundreds of wrestling moves at your disposal to get the pinfall or submission.

Features

  • 18 Wrestlers to choose from
  • 11 Different match types
  • 48 Round Tournament
  • Final boss battle on the 48th round
  • Actual Refs to referee the mach
  • Unlockable: Hilarious Bighead Mode
  • Unlockable: Editor Mode - Create up to 95 wrestlers!
